newsitem.title: GREECE: EMPORIKI INSURANCE LAUNCHES NEW BUSINESS INSURANCE PLAN.
newsitem.headline: EMPORIKI INSURANCE LAUNCHES NEW BUSINESS INSURANCE PLAN.

text.p: Alpha Credit Bank subsidiary Emporiki Insurance introduced a new insurance programme for small and large entreprises called Eurobusiness, it said in a statement.
The new programme offers a variety of insurance options and competitive premiums to all kinds of firms, it said.
Alpha Credit Bank is the founder and main shareholder of Emporiki Insurance whose equity and free reserves stand at 3.7 billion drachmas. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
